Package net.tp.utils

Class NumberUtils

java.lang.Object
net.tp.utils.NumberUtils
public abstract class NumberUtils extends Object
A utility class for numbers.

1.0.0

    • isNonDecimalNumber

      @Deprecated public static <T extends Number> boolean isNonDecimalNumber(T number, boolean classBased)
      Deprecated.
      use nonDecimalNumber(Number, boolean) instead
      Checks if a given number is a non-decimal number.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the number
      Parameters:
      number - the number to check
      classBased - if the check should be based on the class of the number
      Returns:
      true if the number is a non-decimal number, false otherwise
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • isEven

      public static <T extends Number> boolean isEven(T number)
      Checks if a given number is even. For decimal numbers the check is based on the floor of the number.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the number
      Parameters:
      number - the number to check
      Returns:
      true if the number is even, false otherwise
      Since:
      1.0.0

    • factorial

      public static <T extends Number> Number factorial(T number)
      Calculates the factorial of a number.

      WARNING: for number under the max Long number (input number > 20) the method return a long value, else a BigInteger. For decimal number always a BigDecimal.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the number
      Parameters:
      number - the number to calculate the factorial of
      Returns:
      the factorial of the given number
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the number is negative
      Since:
      1.0.0
